story: Margaery Tyrell was Queen Consort for the House Tyrell and was known in the whole kingdom as an influencer. Everything was quiet as the peace of Margaery Tyrell threatened one day Robert Baratheon. Initially, Margaery Tyrell was afraid, but with help of Tommen Baratheon grew stronger and learned invisibility. On the first day of spring in Torrhen's square, Margaery met Tyrell Alerie and forged an alliance. Margaery Tyrell and Alerie Tyrell were almost in Karhold at night, when they realized that Robert Baratheon was after them, but the two friends were ready and the battle started. Margaery Tyrell used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, peace was no longer under threat and Margaery and Alerie celebrated Tyrell at White Harbor by organizing a concert.

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was known as a bureaucrat in the whole kingdom. Petyr Baelish had a happy and peaceful life when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the House of Petyr Baelish. Our Hero was too weak, but Petyr Baelish learned the power of fire sorcery with the help of Lysa Arryn. On the way to the Great Sept of Baelor at night Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn and they soon became friends. After traveling across all of the kingdom, Petyr Baelish finally found Daenerys Targaryen in the Kings Landing with the help of Robert Arryn, a bloody battle began, but Petyr Baelish got the better of Daenerys Targaryen with fire sorcery powers. This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the house and celebrated in The Vale of Arryn with Robert Arryn by playing a game.

story: Long ago Jon Snow, Lord of Stark House, was known to be very good as ruler. Everything was quiet when Bran Stark threatened the treasure of Jon Snow one day. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Ygritte to seek help. Ygritte was a master of gravity control and taught the hero all her secrets. In the Red Keep at the Winter Solstice, Jon met Rickard Stark and formed an alliance. On the first day of spring, Jon Snow and Rickard Stark were almost on Bear Island when they realized that Bran Stark was after them, however the two friends were ready and the battle began. Jon Snow used gravity control to force the enemy to retreat. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the treasure and in The Ruby Ford celebrated Rickard Stark with a feast.

story: One day, a murderer whose name was Petyr Baelish, Petyr Baelish was a Lord from the Tyrell House. Petyr Baelish had a happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened Petyr Baelish Castle. Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid, but with the help of Lysa Arryn, became stronger and learned invisibility. On the way to the Whispering Wood at night, Petyr met Baelish Robert Arryn and they immediately became friends. After travelling throughout the whole kingdom Petyr Baelish finally found in Crossroads Inn Bran Stark with the help of Robert Arryn; a bloody battle began but Petyr Baelish gained the edge thanks to invisibility powers on Bran Stark. After the victory the castle was no longer under threat. Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn celebrated by watching a play in Torrhen's Square.

story: Arya Stark was Lady for House Stark and was known as an assassin in the entire kingdom. Everything was quiet when Cersei Lannister threatened Arya Stark's treasure one day. Arya Stark was initially fearful, but with the help of Robb Stark got stronger and learned mind control. In the Eyrie at the Winter Solstice, Arya Stark met Bran Stark and they formed an alliance. Finally in Karhold at the Autumn Equinox Arya Stark faced Cersei Lannister and it ran away Cersei Lannister with the help of Bran Stark and thanks to the learned powers of mind control. The treasure was not under threat anymore, and Arya Stark and Bran Stark celebrated Winterfell by making fireworks.

story: Long ago, Cersei Lannister, Queen regnant of the Baratheon House, was known as a very good mass murderer. Everything was quiet when Margaery Tyrell threatened the freedom of Cersei Lannister a day later. Cersei Lannister was initially scared but gained strength and learned invisibility with the help of Euron Greyjoy. During a long training session in The Vale of Arryn on the first day of Spring, Cersei Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon, who got along immediately and decided to travel together. Finally on the first day of the spring in the Great Sept of Baelor, Cersei Lannister faced Margaery Tyrell with the help of Myrcella Baratheon and thanks to the learned power of invisibility, the alliance scared away Margaery Tyrell. After all, a freedom was finally assured again Cersei Lannister and Myrcella Baratheon went to the Vale of Arryn and celebrated with a play.

story: Daenerys Targaryen was Princess for the House Targaryen and was also known as a ruler in the whole kingdom. Daenerys Targaryen was having a happy and peaceful life when Arya Stark threatened the treasure of Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was initially afraid, but with the help of Lyarra Stark, became stronger and learned the teleportation. Daenerys Targaryen met Aerys II Targaryen at sunrise and they formed an alliance in Winterfell. At the autumnal equinox in Deepwood Motte, Daenerys Targaryen Arya Stark encountered with the help of Aerys II Targaryen and thanks to the learned power of Teleportation the alliance spooked away Arya Stark Aici was how Daenerys managed Targaryen to save the treasure and celebrated Aerys II Targaryen at Great Sept.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for Stark House and was also known as a prophet in the whole kingdom. The evil Tyrion Lannister threatened to threaten Bran Stark's peace one day. Our hero was too weak but with the help of Catelyn Stark, Bran Stark learned the power of invisible. During a long training session at Oldstones at the Autumnal Equinox, Bran met Robb Stark, who immediately got along and decided to travel together. After traveling across the whole kingdom, Bran Stark finally found Tyrion Lannister with the help of Robb Stark in the Trident, a bloody battle begun, but Bran Stark got Tyrion Lannister in the way thanks to his invisibility powers. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the peace and in White Harbor celebrated with Robb Stark by watching a play.

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as a bureaucrat. Everything was quiet when a day Robert Baratheon threatened the jewel of Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was initially afraid but got stronger with help from Lysa Arryn and learnt invisibility. At Christmas, during a long training session at Moat Cailin, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn and immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Karhold at the Summer Solstice, Petyr Baelish faced Robert Baratheon, who was scared away by the alliance with the help of Robert Arryn and through the learnt power of invisibility. After the victory, the jewel was not under threat anymore. Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn celebrated in Bear Island by watching a play.

story: Bran Stark was Lord of the Stark House and was also known as a prophet throughout the whole kingdom. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened Bran Stark's castle. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Arya Stark to seek help. Arya Stark was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. Bran Stark met Sansa Stark on the road to Raventree Hall at Christmas and became immediate friends. After travelling the entire kingdom, Bran stark finally found Petyr Baelish with the help of Sansa Stark in Bear Island. A bloody battle started but Bran Stark got the better of Petyr Baelish due to invisibility powers. This is how Bran Stark managed to save the castle and celebrated with Sansa Stark on Bear Island by organizing a concert.

story: Margaery Tyrell was Queen Consort for the House Tyrell and was also known as an influencer in the entire kingdom. Everything was quiet when Tyrion Lannister threatened the peace of Margaery Tyrell one day. Our hero was too weak but with the help of Joffrey Baratheon, Margaery Tyrell learned the power of gravity control. At the autumnal Equinox in Winterfell, Margaery Tyrell met Mace Tyrell and formed an alliance. After travelling through all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell finally found Tyrion Lannister in White Harbor with the help of Mace Tyrell. A bloody battle started but Margaery Tyrell gained the better of Tyrion Lannister thanks to the gravity control powers. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the peace and in The Whispering Wood toasted the feast with Mace Tyrell.

story: Jon Snow was King for the house of Stark and was known as a soldier in the whole Kingdom. The bad Arya Stark one day posed a threat to Jon Snow's peace. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Rhaegar Targaryen to seek help. Rhaegar Targaryen was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to The Trident at Christmas, Jon met Snow Rhaella Targaryen and they immediately became friends. After travelling across the whole kingdom, Jon Snow finally found Arya Stark in Karhold with the help of Rhaella Targaryen, a bloody battle began but Jon Snow got ahead of Arya Stark thanks to his invisibility powers. After the victory, peace was no longer in danger, Jon Snow and Rhaella Targaryen celebrated at Torrhen's Square by listening to a story.

story: Once upon a time there was a murderer whose name was Petyr Baelish, who was a Lord of Tyrell House. When Bran Stark threatened the castle of Petyr Baelish, everything was quiet. Petyr Baelish was initially afraid, but with the help of Lysa Arryn he got stronger and learned the teleportation. Petyr met Baelish on Christmas during a long training session in Torrhen's Square, they immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Autumnal Equinox, Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn were almost in the Whispering Wood when they realized that Bran Stark was after them, but the two friends were prepared and the battle began, Petyr Baelish used teleportation and forced the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the castle was no longer in danger. Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn celebrated in the Ruby Ford with a feast.

story: Cersei Lannister was Queen of the Lannister House and was also known as a mass murderer in the whole kingdom. The evil Margaery Tyrell posed a threat to the Castle of Cersei Lannister one day. Cersei Lannister was initially afraid but with the help of Euron Greyjoy he gained stronger and learned military strategy. During a long training session in Raventree Hall at night, Cersei Lannister met Shae and they immediately got along and decided to travel together. Cersei Lannister finally faced Margaery Tyrell in the Vale of Arryn at Night, with the help of Shae and thanks to the learnt force of military strategy, the alliance scared away Margaery Tyrell. This is how Cersei Lannister managed to save the castle and he celebrated with Shae in Torrhen's square by playing a game.

story: A long time ago, Arya Stark, the Lady of the house Stark, was known to be very good as mass murderer. The evil Robert Baratheon posed a threat to Arya Stark's freedom one day. Our hero was too weak but with the help of Eddard Stark Arya Stark learned the power of military strategy. During a long training session in The Ruby Ford during the Autumnal Equinox Arya Stark met Rickon Stark and immediately came along and decided to travel together. At sunrise, Arya Stark and Rickon Stark were almost in Kings Landing when they realized that Robert Baratheon was after them, but the two friends were still ready and the battle started ; Arya Stark used military strategy to force the enemy to retreat. After the victory, freedom was no longer threatened and Arya Stark and Rickon Stark celebrated the battle with a feast in Deepwood Motte.

story: A long time ago, Jon Snow, Lord of the Stark house, was known to be very good as a spy. Everything was quiet when one day Arya Stark threatened the jewel of Jon Snow. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Aegon Targaryen to seek help - Aegon Targaryen was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all of its secrets. During a long training session in Seagard at the Winter Solstice, Jon Snow met Targaryen Aerys II who immediately became together and decided to go together. In Torrhen's Square, Jon Snow faced Arya Stark at the Autumnal Equinox and with the help of Aerys II Targaryen and thanks to the learned power of teleportation, the Alliance Arya Stark terrorized. So Jon Snow managed to save the jewel and celebrated at Castle Black with Aerys II Targaryen by organizing a concert.

story: One time, a liar whose name was Margaery Tyrell was a queen consort of House Tyrell. Cersei Lannister posed a threat to the House of Margaery Tyrell one day. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Mace Tyrell, Margaery Tyrell learned the power of the mind controlling. During a long training session in Crossroads Inn on the Winter Solstice, Margaery met Tyrell Joffrey Baratheon and immediately agreed to travel together. Margaery Tyrell finally faced Cersei Lannister in the Eyrie on the first day of the Spring. With the help of Joffrey Baratheon and thanks to the learnt power of Mind Controlling, the alliance Cersei Lannister was scared away. Finally, the House was safe again, Margaery Tyrell and Joffrey Baratheon went to The Trident and celebrated by organizing a concert.

story: Cersei Lannister, the Queen of the House of Baratheon, was known to be very good as a regent long ago. The evil Margaery Tyrell posed a threat to the treasure of Cersei Lannister a day later. Our hero was too weak, but Cersei Lannister learnt the power of military strategy with the assistance of Euron Greyjoy. On the way to the Great Sept of Baelor at sunrise, Cersei Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon and they immediately became friends. After travelling across the kingdom, Cersei Lannister finally found Margaery Tyrell with the help of Myrcella Baratheon in Saltpans. A bloody battle began but Cersei Lannister got the better of Margaery Tyrell thanks to military strategy powers. How Cersei Lannister managed to save the treasure and in Riverlands he celebrated by organizing a concert with Myrcella Baratheon.

story: A long time ago, Petyr Baelish, a Lord of the House of Tyrell, was known to be very good as a murderer. The evil Arya Stark posed one day a threat to the freedom of Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish did not know what to do and went to Lysa Arryn to seek help, Lysa Arryn was a master of military strategy and taught all her secrets to the hero. Petyr met Baelish at the Autumn Equinox in The Whispering Wood and formed an alliance. Petyr Baelish finally faced Arya Stark at Night in Winterfell, with the help of Robert Arryn and thanks to the learned power of military strategy the alliance has scared away Arya Stark. Finally, freedom was back in the safe zone, Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn went to White Harbor and celebrated by watching a play.

story: Once upon a time a ruler whose name was Daenerys Targaryen was a princess from the house Targaryen. Everything was quiet when one day Robert Baratheon threatened to destroy Daenerys Targaryens gem. Daenerys Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Rickard Stark to seek help - Rickard Stark was a master of firesherrry and taught the hero all its secrets. Daenerys Targaryen met Rhaegar Targaryen in Oldstones at the summer solstice and formed an alliance. Daenerys Targaryen finally faced Robert Baratheon at the Winter Solstice and the alliance was threatened by Rhaegar Targaryen and thanks to the learned power of fire sorcery. This is how Daenerys Targaryen managed to save the Jewel and celebrated with Rhaegar Targaryen in Oldstones by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell Margaery Tyrell was a Queen Consort of the House Tyrell. The evil Robert Baratheon posed a threat to the House of Margaery Tyrell one day. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Mace Tyrell to seek help. Mace Tyrell was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session at the Winter Solstice in Deepwood Motte, Margaery Tyrell met Willas Tyrell and they quickly got along and decided to travel together. After traveling across the entire Kingdom, Margaery Tyrell finally found Robert Baratheon in Torrhen's Square with the help of Willas Tyrell, but Margaery Tyrell got the better of Robert Baratheon thanks to his invisibility powers. The house was finally safe again and Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell went to Whispering Wood and celebrated by getting married.

story: Once upon a time there was a murderer whose name was Petyr Baelish, who was a lord of the House Tyrell. Everything was quiet when Margaery Tyrell threatened the treasure of Petyr Baelish on a days end. Petyr Baelish was initially afraid, but with the help of Robert Arryn got stronger and learned invisibility. On the way to Winterfell at the first day of spring, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they immediately became friends. After traveling through the whole kingdom Petyr Baelish finally found Margaery Tyrell in the Dreadfort. A bloody battle began but Petyr Baelish got the better of Margaery Tyrell thanks to invisibility powers. This is how Petyr Baelish managed to save the treasure and celebrated The Whispering Wood with Lysa Arryn by listening to a story.

story: Cersei Lannister was a queen regnant for the House Baratheon and was also known as a mass murderer in the entire kingdom. The evil Arya Stark posed a threat to the jewel of Cersei Lannister one day. Cersei Lannister did not know what to do and went to Tywin Lannister to seek help Tywin Lannister was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all his secrets. On the way to Riverlands at the summer solstice, Cersei met Lannister Tyrion Lannister and they immediately became friends. Cersei Lannister finally found Arya Stark in Seagard after travelling across the entire kingdom with the help of Tyrion Lannister, a bloody battle began but Cersei Lannister got the better of Arya Stark thanks to his invisibility powers. In a short period of time, the jewel was again safe to Cersei Lannister and Tyrion Lannister went to Torrhen's Square and celebrated by watching a play.

story: Robert Baratheon, King of the Andals the Rhoynar and the first men from the House Baratheon was known to be very good as a revolutionary. The evil Tyrion Lannister posed a threat to Robert Baratheon's peace one day. Our hero was too weak but with the help of Cassana Baratheon, Robert Baratheon learned the power of gravity control. During a long training session in White Harbor at sunrise, Robert met Steffon Baratheon and immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Saltpans at Night, Robert Baratheon faced Tyrion Lannister, with the help of Steffon Baratheon and thanks to the learned power of gravity control, the alliance scared away Tyrion Lannister. Eventually, the peace was restored: Robert Baratheon and Steffon Baratheon went to The Whispering Wood and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: A long time ago Bran Stark, the Lord from Stark House, was known to be very good as a prophet. The evil Robert Baratheon posed a threat to the peace of Bran Stark one day. Our hero was too weak but with the help of Sansa Stark, Bran Stark learned the power of fire sorcery. Bran Stark met Arya Stark in Ruby Ford at the Summer Solstice and they formed an alliance. Bran Stark and Arya Stark were in The Twins almost at sunrise when they realized that Robert Baratheon was after them, but the two friends were still ready and the battle began, Bran Stark used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the peace was no longer in danger. Bran Stark and Arya Stark celebrated in Saltpans by listening to a story.

story: Once upon a time there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord of the Stark House. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened the jewel of Bran Stark. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Sansa Stark Bran Stark learned the power of military strategy. On the way to Karhold at the Winter Solstice, Bran met Stark Eddard Stark and immediately became friends. Bran Stark finally faced Cersei Lannister in the Whispering Wood on the first day of spring with the help of Eddard Stark and thanks to the learned power of military strategy, the alliance scared away Cersei Lannister. This is how Bran managed to save the jewel and celebrated with Eddard Stark in Kings Landing by getting married

story: A long time ago, Jon Snow, King of Stark House, was known to be very good as rulers. Jon Snow had a happy and peaceful life when Tyrion Lannister threatened the jewel of Jon Snow. Initially Jon Snow was fearful but with the help of Rickard Stark, he got stronger and learned to control mind. On the way to Red Keep on Christmas Day, Jon Snow met Hizdahr Zoo Loraq and they immediately became friends. In Seagard at the Winter Solstice, Jon Snow faced Tyrion Lannister, and with the help of Hizdahrzo Loraq and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling, the alliance scared Tyrion Lannister away. Eventually the jewel was again safe : Jon Snow and Hizdahr zo Loraq went to Raventree Hall and celebrated by getting married.

story: There was once a regent whose name was Cersei Lannister : Cersei Lannister was the Queen of the Lannister House. Everything was quiet when Robert Baratheon threatened the treasure of Cersei Lannister a day later. Our hero was too weak, but Cersei Lannister learned the power of military strategy with the help of Joanna Lannister. Cersei Lannister met Jaime Lannister at Oldstones at the Winter Solstice and formed an alliance. Finally in The Eyrie at the Winter Solstice, Cersei Lannister confronted Robert Baratheon who scoured the alliance with the help of Jaime Lannister and thanks to the learned power of military strategy. Eventually the treasure was once again safe and Cersei Lannister and Jaime Lannister went to The Iron Island and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: Long ago, the Lord of Tyrell was known to be very good as a bureaucrat Petyr Baelish. All was quiet when Tyrion Lannister threatened the peace of Petyr Baelish a day later. Our hero was too weak, but Petyr Baelish learned the power of fire sorcery with the help of Robert Arryn. On the route to the Great Sept of Baelor at Christmas, Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn and they immediately became friends. After the sunrise in Castle Black, Petyr Baelish faced Tyrion Lannister with the help of Lysa Arryn and thanks to the learned power of fire sorcery the alliance drew away Tyrion Lannister. After the victory, the peace was not in danger anymore. Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn played a game in The Whispering Wood.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for House Lannister and was also known as a bureaucrat in the whole kingdom. Everything was quiet when Arya Stark threatened Tyrion Lannisters treasure a day later. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Cersei Lannister, Tyrion learned a power of gravity control. At sunrise in Winterfell, Tyrion met Lannister Shae and they formed an alliance. After travelling across the whole Kingdom, Tyrion Lannister finally found the Eyrie with the help of Shae Arya Stark a bloody battle, but Tyrion Lannister got Arya Stark better than with gravity control powers. Finaly, the treasure was back safe and Tyrion Lannister and Shae went to The Eyrie and celebrated with a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was a rebel whose name was Robert Baratheon: Robert Baratheon was Lord of Baratheon House. Daenerys Targaryen posed a threat to the jewel of Robert Baratheon one day. Robert Baratheon was initially afraid but with the help of Renly Baratheon he got stronger and learned teleportation. In the Eyrie at sunrise, Robert met Baratheon Cassana Baratheon and they formed an alliance. At the Autumnal Equinox were Robert Baratheon and Cassana Baratheon almost in Deepwood Motte when they realized that Daenerys Targaryen was following them but the two friends were ready and the battle began. Robert Baratheon used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. Eventually the jewel was safe again. Robert Baratheon and Cassana Baratheon went to the Dreadfort and celebrated by getting married.

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the Tyrell House and was also known as a serviceman in the whole kingdom. The evil Bran Stark posed a threat to the House Petyr Baelish. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Robert Arryn Petyr Baelish learned the power of teleportation. Petyr Baelish met Lysa Arryn on the way to Karhold at sunrise and they immediately became friends. After travelling all over the kingdom, Petyr Baelish finally found Bran Stark in the Trident with the help of Lysa Arryn, an ensuing bloody fight but Petyr Baelish got rid of Bran Stark thanks to teleportation powers. The house was finally restored - Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn went to Red - Keep and celebrated by having a feast.

story: Once upon a time there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark, who was a Lord from the House of Stark. Everything was quiet when Robert Baratheon threatened the peace of Bran Stark a day later. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Catelyn Stark to ask for help. Catelyn Stark was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. On the route to Saltpans at Christmas, Bran Stark met Arya Stark and immediately became friends. At the summer solstice, Bran Stark and Arya Stark were almost in Torrhen's Square when they realized that Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends were ready and the battle began. Bran Stark used military strategy to force the enemy to retreat. This is how Bran Stark managed to save peace and filmed a play with Arya Stark in the Great Sept of Baelor.

story: There was once a spy whose name was Jon Snow, a prince of Targaryen House. Everything was quiet when Robert Baratheon threatened the freedom of Jon Snow a day. Initially, Jon Snow was afraid, but with the help of Rhaenys Targaryen he became stronger and learned mind controlling. In Oldstones at Night, Jon Snow met Lyanna Stark and formed an alliance. In The Trident at the Autumn Equinox Jon Snow finally faced Robert Baratheon and with the help of Lyanna Stark and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling, the alliance scared Robert Baratheon away. Once again the freedom was safe - Jon Snow and Lyanna Stark went to the Trident and celebrated by listening to a storyteller.

story: A long time ago, Daenerys Targaryen was known as a very good ruler of the House Targaryen. The evil Tyrion Lannister posed a threat to the house of Daenerys Targaryen one day. Aerys II Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Aerys II to seek help. Aerys II Targaryen was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all his secrets. On the way to Winterfell in the Autumnal Equinox Daenerys Targaryen met Hizdahr zo Loraq and they immediately became friends. Daenerys Targaryen finally faced Tyrion Lannister in the Trident during the Winter Solstice. With the help of Hizdahr Zo Loraq and thanks to learned force of fire sorcery, the Alliance managed to scare Tyrion Lannister away. After the victory, the house was no longer under threat and Daenerys Targaryen and Hizdahr zo Loraq celebrated their victory in Bear Island by playing a game.

story: Baratheon was Lord of the House of Baratheon and was also known as a revolutionary in the entire kingdom. Everything was quiet when Tyrion Lannister threatened the freedom of Robert Baratheon a day later. Robert Baratheon was initially afraid but with the help of Stannis Baratheon he developed stronger and learned teleportation. In Raventree Hall at night, Robert Baratheon met Steffon Baratheon and they formed an alliance. Robert Baratheon finally faced Tyrion Lannister in Moat Cailin during the Autumnal Equinox and with the help of Steffon Baratheon and thanks to the learned powers of teleportation, the alliance Tyrion Lannister scared away. Robert Baratheon and Steffon Baratheon celebrated in The Trident through a storytelling.

story: Arya Stark was the Lady for the House Stark and was also known as a warrior in the whole Kingdom. The evil Daenerys Targaryen posed a threat to the freedom of Arya Stark one day. Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Bran Stark to seek help. Bran Stark was a master of gravity control and taught the hero all his secrets. Arya Stark met Catelyn Stark on the first day of spring - a long training session in The Whispering Wood - quickly got along and agreed to travel together. Arya Stark finally faced Daenerys Targaryen in Red Keep at Night, and with the help of Catelyn Stark and thanks to the learned power of gravity control the Alliance scared Daenerys Targaryen away. After the victory, freedom was not under threat anymore : Arya Stark and Catelyn Stark celebrated in The Whispering Wood by a feast.

story: Arya Stark was a Lady of Stark House and was also known as a mass murderer in the entire kingdom. Arya Stark was having a happy and peaceful life when Jon Snow threatened Arya Stark's jewel. Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Rickon Stark to seek help; Rickon Stark was a master of mind-controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. On the road to Ruby Ford at the Autumnal Equinox, Arya met Stark Catelyn and they became friends immediately. Arya Stark and Catelyn Stark were almost in the twins at night when they realized Jon Snow was after them but the two friends were ready to go and the battle began Arya Stark used mind control to force the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the jewel was not under threat anymore. Arya Stark and Catelyn Stark celebrated in Torrhen's Square with a play.

story: A long time ago Petyr Baelish, Lord of Tyrell House, was known to be very good as a murderer. Petyr Baelish had a happy and peaceful life when Margaery Tyrell threatened to destroy the castle of Petyr Baelish. Our hero was too weak, but Petyr Baelish learned the power of military strategy with the help of Lysa Arryn. Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn during a long training session in Kings Landing at the Autumnal Equinox and immediately they got along and decided to travel together. Petyr Baelish, with the help of Robert Arryn, finally found Margaery Tyrell in the Great Sept of Baelor, and a bloody battle began but Petyr Baelish gained the better of Margaery Tyrell thanks to military strategy powers. After the victory, the castle was no longer under threat. Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn celebrated by making fireworks in the great sept of Baelor.

story: Once upon a time, there was a warrior whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a Lady from House Stark. Arya Stark was having a happy and peaceful life when Margaery Tyrell threatened the castle of Arya Stark. Arya Stark was initially afraid, but with the help of Robb Stark he became stronger and learned the science of fire. At sunrise during a long training session in Raventree Hall, Arya Stark met Rickon Stark and immediately got along and decided to go travel together. Finally, in The Iron Island at the Winter Solstice, Arya Stark faced Margaery Tyrell, he frightened the alliance by using the help of Rickon Stark and thanks to the learned power of fire sorcery. This is how Arya Stark managed to save the castle and in The Twins with Rickon Stark celebrated by making fireworks.

story: Long ago, Jon Snow, Lord of House Targaryen was known to be very good as a ruler. Everything was quiet when Cersei Lannister threatened the Castle of Jon Snow. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Aerys II Targaryen to seek help Aerys II Targaryen was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all his secrets. During a long training session in The Ruby Ford at sunrise, Jon Snow met Daenerys Targaryen and immediately met up and decided to travel together. At the Winter Solstice Jon Snow and Daenerys Targaryen were almost in the Iron Island when they realized Cersei Lannister was after them but the two friends were ready and the battle began. Jon Snow used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. The castle was finally safe again, Jon Snow and Daenerys Targaryen went to the Whispering Wood and celebrated by playing a game.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the house of Lannister and was also known as a murderer in the whole kingdom. Tyrion Lannister had a happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened Tyrion Lannisters freedom. Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Lancel Lannister to seek help. Lancel Lannister was a master of mind control and taught the hero all its secrets. At sunrise, Tyrion met Lannister in The Eyrie and formed an alliance. Tyrion Lannister finally faced Bran Stark at sunrise on the Iron Island and awoke with the help of Joanna Lannister and thanks to the learned power of mind control the alliance averted Bran Stark. The freedom was no longer under threat after the victory : Tyrion Lannister and Joanna Lannister celebrated in Oldstones by marrying.

story: Bran Stark was Lord of the House of Stark and was also known as a prophet in the whole kingdom. All was quiet when Cersei Lannister threatened the jewel of Bran Stark the next day. Our hero was too weak, but Bran Stark learned the power of military strategy with the help of Arya Stark. During a long training session in Karhold at the Winter Solstice, Bran Stark met Rickon Stark, who immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling through the entire kingdom, Bran Stark found Cersei Lannister on Bear Island with the help of Rickon Stark. A bloody battle began but Bran Stark got the better of Cersei Lannister thanks to military strategy powers. Eventually, the jewel was safe again and Bran Stark and Rickon Stark went to the Trident and celebrated by marrying.

story: Arya Stark was a Lady for Stark House and was also known as a warrior in the whole kingdom. The evil Jon Snow posed a threat to Arya Stark's peace one day. Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Bran Stark to seek help. Bran Stark was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. Arya Stark met Robb Stark during a long training session on the September Great of Baelor at the Summer Solstice and immediately got along and decided to travel together. Arya Stark finally faced Jon Snow in The Twins at Night, which with the help of Robb Stark and thanks to the learned power of invisibility, threatened Jon Snow. This is how Arya Stark managed to save peace and celebrated the fireworks in Moat Cailin with Robb Stark.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for Stark House and was also known as a prophet in the whole kingdom. The evil Cersei Lannister posed a threat to the jewel of Bran Stark one day. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Sansa Stark Bran Stark learnt the power of fire sorcery. In the Riverlands at the Autumnal Equinox, Bran Stark met Eddard Stark and they formed an alliance. In Seagard finally faced Bran Stark Cersei Lannister at sunrise, with the help of Eddard Stark and thanks to the learned power of fire sorcery the Alliance scared Cersei Lannister away. Bran Stark managed to save the jewel and celebrated in Raventree Hall with Eddard Stark by organizing a concert.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the entire kingdom as an advisor. Tyrion Lannister had an easy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened the treasure of Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Euron Greyjoy to seek help, Euron Greyjoy was a master of military strategy, and taught the hero all his secrets. During a long training session in Deepwood Motte at sunrise, Tyrion met Lannister Lancel Lannister who immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Winter Solstice, Tyrion Lannister and Lancel Lannister were almost in Castle Black when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them, but the two friends were ready and the battle began. Tyrion Lannister used military strategy and forced the enemy to retreat. This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the treasure and celebrated with Lancel Lannister by having a feast on Bear Island.

story: Daenerys Targaryen was Princess of the House of Targaryen and was also known as a revolutionary in the whole kingdom. Daenerys Targaryen had a happy and peaceful life when Robert Baratheon threatened the freedom of Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was initially afraid, but with the help of Hizdahr zo Loraq, he got stronger and learned teleportation. In Red Keep at Night, Daenerys Targaryen met Jon Snow, and they formed an alliance. In Deepwood Motte on the first day of Spring Daenerys Targaryen faced Robert Baratheon and the Alliance scared off Robert Baratheon with the help of Jon Snow and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation. Eventually freedom was again safe. Daenerys Targaryen and Jon Snow went to Riverlands and celebrated by making fireworks.

story: Cersei Lannister was a kingmaker for the House Lannister and was also known as an advisor in the whole kingdom. Cersei Lannister had a happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened the jewel of Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister did not know what to do and went to Jaime Lannister to seek help and taught the hero all its secrets. Cersei Lannister met Euron Greyjoy on the winter solstice in Bear Island and formed an alliance. Cersei Lannister and Euron Greyjoy were almost in Deepwood Motte at the Winter Solstice when they realized that Bran Stark was after them, but they were ready and the battle started Cersei Lannister used a military strategy to force the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the jewel was not under threat anymore : Cersei Lannister and Euron Greyjoy celebrated in the Iron Island by playing a game.

story: Quite a long time ago, Robert Baratheon, King of Andals the Rhoynar and the First Men of House Baratheon was known to be very good a hunter. Cersei Lannister one day posed a threat to Robert Baratheon's jewelry. Initially, Robert Baratheon was afraid but by the help of Gendry got stronger and learned the military strategy. In the Dreadfort at the Summer Solstice, Robert Baratheon met Edric Storm and formed an alliance. After travelling across the whole of the Kingdom, Robert Baratheon finally found Cersei Lannister with the help of Edric Storm in The Iron Island. A bloody battle began but Robert Baratheon got to take over by military strategic powers of Cersei Lannister. This is how Robert Baratheon managed to save the Jewel and in the Moat Cailin celebrated with Edric Storm by playing a game.

story: Cersei Lannister, Queen Regnant of the House Lannister, was known to be very good as an advisor a long time ago. Cersei Lannister was having a happy and peaceful life when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the castle of Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was initially scared, but with the help of Jaime Lannister became stronger and learned mind control. Cersei Lannister met Shae in the night at Crossroads Inn and formed an alliance. Finally in White Harbor at the winter solstice, Cersei Lannister faced Daenerys Targaryen, with the help of Shae and thanks to the learned power of mind control the Alliance Daenerys Targaryen scared away. This is how Cersei Lannister managed to save the castle and celebrated the twins with Shae by having a feast.

story: Once upon a time, there was a ruler whose name was Robert Baratheon, who was a Lord of the Baratheon House. Robert Baratheon had a happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened the treasure of Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon did not know what to do and went to Renly Baratheon to seek help. Renly Baratheon was a master of mind control and revealed all her secrets to the hero. During a long training session at The Twins at Christmas, Robert met Baratheon Gendry and immediately gathered around and decided to travel together. Robert Baratheon finally faced Cersei Lannister in Saltpans at night and the alliance scared off Cersei Lannister with the help of Gendry and thanks to the learned power of mind control. So he managed to salvage the treasure and celebrated with Gendry by playing a game in Seagard.

story: Long ago, Margaery Tyrell, Queen Consort from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as an influencer. Margaery Tyrell had a happy and peaceful life when Daenerys Targaryen threatened the jewel of Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Mace Tyrell to seek help, Mace Tyrell was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all of its secrets. On the first day of Spring at a long training session in The Eyrie, Margaery Tyrell met Loras Tyrell, who got along instantly and decided to travel together. Margaery Tyrell finally faced Daenerys Targaryen at the dark in White Harbor and with the help of Loras Tyrell and thanks to the learned power of the military strategy, the alliance scared Daenerys Targaryen away. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the jewel and celebrates in Seagard with Loras Tyrell by playing a game.

story: A long time ago, Daenerys Targaryen, Princess from the Targaryen House, was known to be very good as ruler. Daenerys Targaryen was having a happy and peaceful life when Petyr Baelish threatened the treasure of Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Rhaenys Targaryen to seek help, Rhaenys Targaryen was a master of fire sorcery and taught hero all of its secrets. In a long training session in Seagard at sunrise, Daenerys Targaryen met Rhaegar Targaryen, who immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling throughout the entire kingdom, Daenerys Targaryen finally found Petyr Baelish in Deepwood Motte with the help of Rhaegar Targaryen a bloody battle began but Daenerys Targaryen got the better of Petyr Baelish thanks to Fire Sorcery powers. Eventually, the treasure was again safe - Daenerys Targaryen and Rhaegar Targaryen went to seagard, and he celebrated by making fireworks.

story: Long ago Petyr Baelish, Lord of the House Tyrell was known as a bureaucrat very good. Petyr Baelish had an happy and peaceful life when Tyrion Lannister threatened the castle of Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was initially scared, but with Lysa Arryn, he got stronger and learned military strategy. At Deepwood Motte in the first day of Spring, Petyr met Baelish Robert Arryn and formed an alliance. Petyr Baelish confronted Tyrion Lannister at the Autumnal Equinox in Karhold and his alliance with the help of Robert Arryn and thanks to the learned power of military strategy sabotaged Tyrion Lannister. This is how Petyr managed to save the castle and celebrated in Karhold with Robert Arryn by having a feast.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for Stark House and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. The evil Cersei Lannister posed a threat to the treasure of Bran Stark one day. Our hero was too weak but Bran Stark learned the power of military strategy with the help of Sansa Stark. On the way to Red Keep at the Summer Solstice, Bran met Catelyn Stark and immediately became friends. After travelling across the entire kingdom, Bran Stark finally found Cersei Lannister with help from Catelyn Stark in Winterfell, but Bran Stark, thanks to military strategy powers, got the better of Cersei Lannister. After the victory, the treasure was no longer under threat and Bran Stark and Catelyn Stark celebrated Red Keep with fireworks.

story: Once upon a time there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell, who was a Queen Consort of the House of Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell had a happy and peaceful life when Daenerys threatened Targaryen's castle at Margaery Tyrell. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Willas Tyrell, Margaery Tyrell learned the power of gravity control. During a long training session at Winterfell at the Solstice, Margaery Tyrell Mace met Tyrell and immediately got along and decided to travel together. On the first day of Spring Margaery Tyrell faced Daenerys Targaryen and with the help of Mace Tyrell and thanks to the learned power of gravity control the alliance Daenerys Targaryen scared away. Margaery Tyrell managed to save the castle and celebrated Mace Tyrell with a feast in Torrhen Square.

story: Daenerys Targaryen was Princess of the House of Targaryen and was also known as a revolutionary in the whole kingdom. Everything was quiet when Arya Stark threatened the treasure of Daenerys Targaryen. Initially, Daenerys Targaryen was fearful but got stronger and learned invisibility with the help of Viserys Targaryen. During a long training session in Deepwood Motte at the Winter Solstice, Daenerys Targaryen met Rhaegar Targaryen, who immediately got along and decided to travel together. Daenerys Targaryen finally faced Arya Stark at the Dreadfort at Christmas. With the help of Rhaegar Targaryen and thanks to the learned power of invisibility the Alliance feared Arya Stark away. This is how Daenerys managed to save Targaryen's treasure and celebrated Seagard with Rhaegar Targaryen by watching a play.

story: A long time ago Daenerys Targaryen, princess from the house Targaryen, was known as a revolutionary very good. Everything was quiet when Petyr Baelish threatened the peace of Daenerys Targaryen one day. Daenerys Targaryen was initially afraid, but with the help of Ygritte, he became stronger and learned invisibility. Daenerys Targaryen met Khal Drogo at Bear Island on the first day of the spring and formed an alliance. At sunrise Daenerys Targaryen and Khal Drogo were almost at Crossroads Inn when they realized that Petyr Baelish was after them but the two friends were ready and the battle began - Daenerys Targaryen used invisibility to force the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the peace was not further threatened, Daenerys Targaryen and Khal Drogo celebrated in the Dreadfort by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell, Margaery Tyrell was a Queen Consort of the House Tyrell. The evil Tyrion Lannister posed a threat to the castle of Margaery Tyrell one day. Our hero was too weak but, with the help of Mace Tyrell, Margaery Tyrell learned the power of gravity control. At a long training session in Saltpans at the Winter Solstice, Margaery met Tyrell Willas and they immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the Summer Solstice, Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell were almost at Kings Landing when they realized that Tyrion Lannister was after them, but the two friends were ready and the battle began. Margaery Tyrell used gravity control, forcing the enemy to retreat. Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell went back to Oldstones and celebrated by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time there was an official whose name was Tyrion Lannister, Tyrion Lannister was a Lord from the house of Lannister. Everything was quiet when Arya Stark threatened the peace of Tyrion Lannister one day. Our Hero was too weak, but Tyrion Lannister learned the power of fire sorcery with the help of Cersei Lannister. During a long training session in Winterfell at the Autumnal Equinox, Tyrion Lannister met Jaime Lannister and they instantly got along and decided to travel together. Tyrion Lannister finally found, with the help of Jaime Lannister, Arya Stark in Ruby Ford, after an affront began but Tyrion Lannister got the better of Arya Stark thanks to fire sorcery powers. Finally, the peace was safe again; Tyrion Lannister and Jaime Lannister went to the tiger and celebrated with fireworks.

story: A long time ago, Robert Baratheon was known to be very good ruler of Andals the Rhoynar and the first men of Baratheon's house. One day, the evil Petyr Baelish posed a threat to the jewel of Robert Baratheon. Initially, Robert Baratheon was afraid, but with the help of Cassana Baratheon, he got stronger and learned military strategy. Robert Baratheon met Stannis Baratheon at a long training session in Bear Island in December and immediately met and decided to travel together. When at the first day of spring Robert Baratheon and Stannis Baratheon were almost in Crossroads Inn when they realized that Petyr Baelish was after them, but the two friends were still prepared and the battle started, Robert Baratheon used military strategy that forced the enemy to retreat. Eventually the jewel was again safe, Robert Baratheon and Stannis Baratheon went to Torrhen's Square and celebrated by watching a play.

story: Once upon a time, a vigilante whose name was Arya Stark. Arya Stark was a house keeper from Stark. All was quiet when a day Margaery Tyrell threatened the jewel of Arya Stark. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Robb Stark Arya Stark learned the power of gravity control. On the way to Castle Black on the first day of Spring Arya met Stark Bran and they immediately became friends. After traveling across all the kingdom, Arya Stark finally found with the help of Bran Stark Margaery Tyrell in Seagard, a bloody battle began but Arya Stark thanks to gravity control powers got the better of Margaery Tyrell After the victory, the jewel was no longer under threat, Arya Stark and Bran Stark celebrated by having a feast in Castle Black.

story: Daenerys Targaryen was a princess for the Targaryen house and was also known as a ruler in the entire kingdom. It was quiet when Arya Stark threatened the peace of Daenerys Targaryen a day earlier. Daenerys Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Aerys II Targaryen to seek help - Aerys II Targaryen was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to The Trident at Winter Solstice, Daenerys Targaryen met Rickard Stark and they immediately became friends. Daenerys Targaryen finally faced Arya Stark at the Autumnal Equinox in Deepwood Motte, the alliance with the help of Rickard Stark and thanks to the learnt power of teleportation, Arya stark feared. After the victory, the peace was not under threat anymore. Daenerys Targaryen and Rickard Stark celebrated a game in Oldstones.

story: Cersei Lannister was Queen regnant for the house Lannister and was also known as the mass murderer in the whole kingdom. Everything was quiet when a day Robert Baratheon threatened the jewel of Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister did not know what to do and went to Lancel Lannister to seek help; Lancel Lannister was a master of gravity control and taught hero all its secrets. During a long training session at the Crossroads Inn at sunrise, Cersei met Lannister Shae and quickly got along and decided to travel together. After traveling through the entire kingdom, Cersei Lannister finally found Robert Baratheon at Bear Island with the help of Shae. A bloody battle began but Cersei Lannister got the better of Robert Baratheon thanks to gravity control powers. After several years, the jewel was found again - Cersei Lannister and Shae went to Kings Landing - and celebrated by watching a play.

story: Jon Snow was Lord for the Stark House and was also known as a soldier in the whole kingdom. One day, the evil Petyr Baelish posed a threat to Jon Snows freedom. Our hero was too weak, but Jon Snow with the help of Aerys II learned the power of military strategy. On the way to the Great Sept of Baelor on the first day of Spring, Jon Snow met Hizdahr Zoo Loraq and they became friends immediately. After traveling across the entire kingdom, Jon Snow finally found Petyr Baelish with help from Hizdahr Zo Loraq on The Iron Island, but Jon Snow managed to get the better of Petyr Baelish thanks to his military strategies. Eventually the freedom was back safe for Jon Snow and Hizdahr zo Loraq to Raventree Hall and celebrated by organizing a concert.

story: Once upon a time, there was a bureaucrat whose name was Petyr Baelish. Petyr Baelish was a Lord of the House Tyrell. Everything was quiet when Arya Stark threatened the treasure of Petyr Baelish a day later. Petyr Baelish did not know what to do and went to Lysa Arryn to seek help ; Lysa Arryn was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all his secrets. Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn at sunrise on the way to Oldstones and they immediately became friends. Petyr Baelish finally faced Arya Stark in The Whispering Wood at the Summer Solstice and with the help of Robert Arryn and thanks to the learned power of teleportation, the alliance Arya Scared. Eventually the treasure was back safe: Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn went to Karhold and celebrated by organizing a concert.

story: Tyrion Lannister, Lord of the House Lannister, was known to be very good as an official long ago. The evil Margaery Tyrell posed a threat to the freedom of Tyrion Lannister one day. Tyrion Lannister was initially afraid but got stronger and learned gravity control with the help of Lancel Lannister. During a long training session at The Whispering Wood at the Autumn Equinox, Tyrion met Lannister Cersei Lannister and immediately went along to travel together. Tyrion Lannister finally faced Margaery Tyrell at the Winter Solstice in Torrhens Square, with the help of Cersei Lannister and thanks to the learned Power of Gravity Control, the alliance scared away Margaery Tyrell. This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the freedom and celebrated in The Iron Island with Cersei Lannister by playing a game.

story: Once upon a time there was an advisor whose name was Tyrion Lannister Tyrion Lannister was a Lord of the House Lannister. One day the evil Arya Stark presented a threat to the freedom of Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister initially was afraid but got stronger with help from Cersei Lannister and learned teleportation. Tyrion Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon at a long training session on Bear Island at the autumnal equinox and they immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Christmas, Tyrion Lannister and Myrcella Baratheon were almost in Crossroads Inn when they realized that Arya Stark was after them, however the two friends were ready and the battle began; Tyrion Lannister teleports the enemy to retreat. That is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the freedom and celebrated by fireworks in the Vale of Arryn with Myrcella Baratheon.

story: Long ago, Robert Baratheon was known as a great hunter from the House Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was having a happy and peaceful life when Jon Snow threatened the house of Robert Baratheon. Robert Baratheon was initially scared, but with the help of Gendry he got stronger and learned a military strategy. During a long training session in Riverlands at the first day of Spring, Robert met Steffon Baratheon, and they immediately got along and decided to travel together. And finally at the Summer Solstice in Raventree Hall, Robert Baratheon confronted Jon Snow. With the help of Steffon Baratheon and thanks to the learned power of the military strategy the alliance rescued Jon Snow. How Robert Baratheon managed to save the House and on Bear Island celebrated with Steffon Baratheon by organizing a concert.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for House Lannister and was also known as a advisor in the whole kingdom. It all was quiet until Arya Stark threatened to steal the jewel of Tyrion Lannister. Tyrion Lannister did not know what to do and went to Shae to seek help, Shae was a master of mind and taught the hero all its secrets. In the Dreadfort at the Winter Solstice, Tyrion Lannister Jaime Lannister met and they formed an alliance. At sunrise, Tyrion Lannister and Jaime Lannister were almost in The Ruby Ford when they realized that Arya Stark was after them, but the two friends were ready and the battle began. Tyrion Lannister used mind controlling to force the enemy to retreat. The victory was no longer under threat at that point - Tyrion Lannister and Jaime Lannister celebrated the victory in Riverlands by making fireworks.

story: Once upon a time there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark, the Lord from Stark House. All was quiet when Robert Baratheon threatened the Castle of Bran Stark one day. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Eddard Stark to find help, Eddard Stark was a master of invisibility and the hero was taught all its secrets. During a long training session at Oldstones on the first day of the Spring, Bran Stark met Catelyn Stark and they immediately got along and decided to travel together. Bran Stark finally faced Robert Baratheon in the Vale of Arryn at the Winter Solstice and with the help of Catelyn Stark and thanks to the learned power of invisibility the alliance scared Robert Baratheon away. Bran Stark and Catelyn Stark went to the Crossroads Inn and celebrated by playing a game.

story: There was once a ruler whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a King from the House of Stark. Cersei Lannister undoubtedly posed a threat to the freedom of Jon Snow. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Rhaella Targaryen Jon Snow learned the power of the teleportation. Jon Snow met Rhaegar Targaryen on the way to White Harbor on the first day of spring and they instantly became friends. At the first day of spring, Jon Snow and Rhaegar Targaryen were fast in the Trident when they realized that Cersei Lannister was after them, but the two friends were ready and the battle began: Jon Snow used teleportation forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the freedom and in Moat Cailin celebrated with Rhaegar Targaryen by watching a play.

story: Once upon a time there was a murderer whose name was Petyr Baelish, Petyr Baelish was a noble of Tyrell House The evil Daenerys Targaryen posed a threat to the castle Petyr Baelish on one day. Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid but got stronger and learned fire sorcery with the help of Lysa Arryn. Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn during a long training session at Kings Landing on sunrise and immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling throughout the entire kingdom, Petyr Baelish finally found Daenerys Targaryen in Great Sept of Baelor with the help of Robert Arryn ; a bloody battle begun but Petyr Baelish, thanks to fire sorcery powers, got the better of Daenerys Targaryen. Eventually, the castle was safe again and Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn went to the Ruby Ford and celebrated by organizing a concert.

story: Arya Stark was the lady for the Stark House and was also known as an assassin in the entire kingdom. Arya Stark had a happy and peaceful life when Tyrion Lannister threatened the peace of Arya Stark. Arya Stark did not know what to do and went to Robb Stark to seek help, Robb Stark was a master of gravity control and trained hero all the secrets of the game. On the way to Moat Cailin at the summer solstice, Arya met Stark Sansa Stark and they quickly became friends. At the crossroads inn at the first day of Spring, Arya Stark faced Tyrion Lannister and with the help of Sansa Stark and thanks to the learned power of gravity control, the Alliance scared away Tyrion Lannister. Eventually the peace was restored: Arya Stark and Sansa Stark went to the trident and celebrated with fireworks.

story: A long time ago, Tyrion Lannister, Lord of the House of Lannister, was known as very good as an advisor. Everything was quiet when Margaery Tyrell threatened the castle of Tyrion Lannister a day later. Our hero was too weak, but Tyrion Lannister learned the power of military strategy with the help of Joanna Lannister. Tyrion Lannister met Tywin Lannister on the way to Torrhen's Square at the Autumn Equinox and they instantly became friends. Tyrion Lannister and Tywin Lannister were almost in The Eyrie at the beginning of spring when they realized that Margaery Tyrell was after them; however, the two friends were prepared and the battle began: Tyrion Lannister used military strategy to force the enemy to retreat. Finaly the castle was again safe, Tyrion Lannister and Tywin Lannister went to the eyrie and celebrated by playing a game.

story: There was once a regent whose name was Cersei Lannister, who was a queen regnant from the House Baratheon. Cersei Lannister had a happy and peaceful life when Margaery Tyrell threatened Cersei Lannisters freedom. Initially, Cersei Lannister was fearful but gained strength with the help of Joanna Lannister and learned fire sorcery. On the way to Raventree Hall at the Summer Solstice, Cersei Lannister met Jaime Lannister and they became friends immediately. At Christmas Cersei Lannister and Jaime Lannister were almost at White Harbor, when they realized that Margaery Tyrell had been after them; the two friends were ready however and the battle began. Cersei Lannister used fire - sorcery and urged the enemy to retreat. Cersei Lannister managed to save freedom and celebrated in Winterfell with Jaime Lannister by a play.

story: Jon Snow was Lord for the Stark House and was also known as a ruler in the whole kingdom. Jon Snow had a happy and peaceful life when Margaery Tyrell threatened the peace of Jon Snow. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Hizdahr Zo Loraq, Jon Snow learned the power of mind control. During a long training session at Castle Black on the Autumnal Equinox, Jon Snow met Rhaenys Targaryen, who immediately came along and decided to travel together. At Christmas Jon Snow and Rhaenys Targaryen were almost in the dreadfort when they realized Margaery Tyrell was after them but the two friends were ready and the battle began. Jon Snow used mind control to force the enemy to retreat. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the peace and in The Dreadfort celebrated with Rhaenys Targaryen by listening to a story.

story: There once stood a mass murderer whose name was Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was a regnant of the House of Lannister. Cersei Lannister had a happy and peaceful life when Jon Snow threatened Cersei Lannister's castle. Our hero was too weak, but Cersei Lannister learned the power of fire sorcery with the help of Myrcella Baratheon. On the way to the Great Sept of Baelor at the Autumn Equinox, Cersei Lannister met Euron Greyjoy and they immediately became friends. Cersei Lannister finally faced Jon Snow in the Eyrie on the first day of spring and spooked the alliance with the help of Euron Greyjoy and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery. After the castle was rebuilt the Cersei Lannister and Euron Greyjoy went to the Vale of Arryn and celebrated by creating fireworks.

story: Arya Stark was Lady for the house Stark and was also known as an assassin in the whole kingdom. Everything was quiet one day when Robert Baratheon threatened the jewel of Arya Stark. Initially, Arya Stark was afraid, but with the help of Rickon Stark, she got stronger and learned to control her mind. During a long training session in Saltpans at sunrise, Arya Stark met Bran Stark, immediately got along and decided to travel together. At sunrise, Arya Stark and Bran Stark were almost at the Great Sept of Baelor when they realized Robert Baratheon was after them. The two friends were nevertheless ready and the battle began. Arya Stark used mind control to force the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the jewel was not under threat again and Arya Stark and Bran Stark celebrated by listening to a narration in The Trident.

story: There once was a squire whose name was Jon Snow Jon Snow was a king of Targaryen House The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the treasures of Jon Snow. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Lyanna Stark to seek help; Lyanna Stark was a master of mind control and gave hero all her secrets. During a long training session on the first day of the spring in Moat Cailin, Jon Snow met Lyarra Stark, who immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Christmas, Jon Snow and Lyarra Stark were almost in Riverlands when they realized Petyr Baelish was after them; the two friends were ready nevertheless and the battle was started - Jon Snow used mind control - foring the enemy to retreat. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the treasure and celebrated in Oldstones with Lyarra Stark by getting married.

story: There once was a ruler whose name was Daenerys Targaryen, Daenerys Targaryen was a Princess of House of Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen was living a happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened the treasure of Daenerys Targaryen. Daenerys Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Lyarra Stark to seek help. Lyarra Stark was a master of gravity control and taught all her secrets to hero. Daenerys Targaryen met Khal Drogo on the way to Red Keep at the autumnal equinox and they instantly became friends. At Christmas Daenerys Targaryen and Khal Drogo were almost in the Eyrie when they realized Cersei Lannister was after them, but the two friends were prepared and the battle began Daenerys Targaryen using gravity control to force the enemy to retreat. This is how Daenerys Targaryen managed to salvage the treasure and celebrated in White Harbor with Khal Drogo with fireworks.

story: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was known as a bureaucrat in the whole kingdom. Petyr Baelish was having a happy and peaceful life when Margaery Tyrell threatened Petyr Baelish's treasure. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Lysa Arryn Petyr Baelish learned the power of Mind Control. On the way to Castle Black on the Winter Solstice, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn and they soon became friends. When Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn realized they were nearly in the castle black when Margaery Tyrell was after them, the two friends were ready and the battle began. Petyr Baelish used mind control to force the enemy to retreat. Eventually the treasure was again safe - Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn went to Red Keep - and celebrated by getting married.

story: Once upon a time there was a bureaucrat whose name was Petyr Baelish, petyr Baelish was a Lord of the house Tyrell. Everything was quiet when Arya Stark threatened to destroy the house of Petyr Baelish a day later. Petyr Baelish did not know what to do and went to Robert Arryn to seek help, Robert Arryn was a master of invisibleity and taught the hero all its secrets. Petyr met Baelish Lysa Arryn on the way to The Dreadfort in the Winter Solstice, and they immediately became friends. In the night, Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn were almost in Torrhen Square when they realized that Arya Stark was after them, the two friends were ready to continue the battle, Petyr Baelish used invisibility forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the house was no longer under threat and Petyr Baelish and Lysa Arryn celebrated in Saltpans by listening to a storytelling.

story: Long ago, Cersei Lannister, the queen regnant of the House of Baratheon, was known to be a very good mass murderer. Cersei Lannister had a happy and peaceful life when Daenerys threatened Targaryen's house Cersei Lannister. Cersei Lannister was initially scared but with the help of Lancel Lannister, he got stronger and learned mind control. On the way to the Whispering Wood at the Winter Solstice, Cersei Lannister met Myrcella Baratheon and they immediately became friends. At the Autumnal Equinox were Cersei Lannister and Myrcella Baratheon almost in The Eyrie when they realized that Daenerys Targaryen was after them, but the two friends were ready and the battle began Cersei Lannister used mind control to force the enemy to retreat. The house was finally safe again: Cersei Lannister and Myrcella Baratheon went to Karhold and celebrated by watching a play.

story: A long time ago, Margaery Tyrell, Queen Consort of House Tyrell was known to be very good as an influencer. Margaery Tyrell was having an happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened the castle of Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell was initially scared, but with the help of Joffrey Baratheon, got stronger and learned fire sorcery. In a long training session at Oldstones on the first day of spring, Mace Tyrell met and she immediately got along and decided to travel together. During the Autumn Equinox, Margaery Tyrell and Mace Tyrell were almost in the Trident when they realized that Cersei Lannister was after them, but the two friends were still ready and the battle began, Margaery Tyrell used Fire Sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the castle and celebrated fireworks with Mace Tyrell in the red keep.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord of the House of Lannister and was also known as a murderer in the entire kingdom. Everything was quiet when Petyr Baelish threatened the house of Tyrion Lannister one day. Our hero was too weak, but Tyrion Lannister learned the power of sorcery with the help of Euron Greyjoy. During a long training session in Moat Cailin at the Summer Solstice, Tyrion Lannister immediately got along and decided to travel together. At the winter solstice, Tyrion Lannister and Tywin Lannister were almost absorbed in Moat Cailin when they realized that Petyr Baelish was after them but the two friends were still ready and the battle began Tyrion Lannister using fire sorcery to force the enemy to retreat. Eventually the house was safe again Tyrion Lannister and Tywin Lannister went to Deepwood Motte and celebrated by having a feast.

story: One time there was a revolutionary whose name was Daenerys Targaryen, who was a princess from the house of Targaryen. The evil Margaery Tyrell threatened the treasure of Daenerys Targaryen one day. Daenerys Targaryen did not know what to do and went to Benjen Stark to seek help; Benjen Stark was a master of military strategy and taught the hero all its secrets. In Torrhen's Square at the Autumnal Equinox Daenerys Targaryen met Hizdahr Zo Loraq and they formed an alliance. After having traveled across the whole kingdom, Daenerys Targaryen finally found out with the help of Hizdahr Zoo Loraq in Seagard, a bloody battle began but Daenerys Targaryen got the better of Margaery Tyrell thanks to military strategy powers. The treasure was not once again under threat after the victory. Daenerys Targaryen and Hizdahr zo Loraq celebrated in Moat Cailin by watching a play.

story: Once upon a time, there was a revolutionary whose name was Robert Baratheon Robert Baratheon was a Lord from the House of Baratheon. When Jon Snow threatened the treasures of Robert Baratheon, everything was quiet. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Cassana Baratheon, Robert Baratheon learned the power of military strategy. On the way to Castle Black at the autumnal equinox, Robert met Baratheon Gendry, who then became friends. Robert Baratheon finally faced Jon Snow at the Winter Solstice in The Iron Island, with the help of Gendry and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy, the alliance escaped Jon Snow. Eventually the treasure was safe again and Robert Baratheon and Gendry went to the twins and celebrated the feast by making a feast.

story: Once upon a time there was an advisor whose name was Petyr Baelish, an architect from the Tyrell house. One day the evil Jon Snow threatened the treasure of Petyr Baelish. Our hero was too weak but Petyr Baelish learned the power of invisibility with the help of Lysa Arryn. Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn during a long training session in Oldstones on the first day of the spring and immediately got along and decided to travel together. At sunrise Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn were almost at the Great Sept of Baelor when they realized that Jon Snow was after them but the two friends were ready and the fight began : Petyr Baelish used invisibility to force the enemy to retreat. How Petyr Baelish managed to save the treasure and celebrated in Winterfell with Robert Arryn by marrying her

story: Margaery Tyrell was Queen Consort for the House Tyrell and was also known as an influencer in the whole kingdom. The evil Petyr Baelish once posed a threat to the freedom of Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Joffrey Baratheon to seek help. Joffrey Baratheon was a master of the mind-controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. In Deepwood Motte, at the first day of Spring, Margaery met Tyrell Tommen Baratheon and they formed an alliance. At the first day of spring, Margaery Tyrell and Tommen Baratheon were almost in Kings Landing when they realized that Petyr Baelish was following them, but the two friends were ready and the battle began. Margaery Tyrell used mind control to force the enemy to retreat. Eventually, freedom was restored ; Margaery Tyrell and Tommen Baratheon went to Red keep and celebrated by getting married.

story: Several years ago Jon Snow, Lord of House Targaryen was known to be very good as a soldier. Jon Snow had a happy and peaceful life when Bran Stark threatened the jewel of Jon Snow. Initially, Jon Snow was afraid but strengthened with the help of Aerys II Targaryen and learned gravity control. Jon Snow met Daenerys Targaryen in night in Torrhen's Square, and they formed an alliance. At the Winter Solstice, Jon Snow and Daenerys Targaryen were almost in the dreadfort when they realized Bran Stark was after them, however the two friends were ready and the battle began with Jon Snow using gravity control for the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the jewel was no longer under threat, Jon Snow and Daenerys Targaryen celebrated in Castle Black with a concert.

story: A long time ago, Robert Baratheon was known as a rebel and King of the Andals the Rhoynar and first man from House Baratheon. When Bran Stark threatened the house of Robert Baratheon he had a happy and peaceful life. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Gendry, Robert Baratheon learnt about the power of invisibility. On the first day of spring, after a long training session in White Harbor, Robert Baratheon met Cassana Baratheon and they immediately got along and decided to travel together. In Bear Island at Christmas, Robert Baratheon finally faced Bran Stark and the alliance with the help of Cassana Baratheon and thanks to the learned power of invisibility of Bran Stark scared away. After the victory, the House was not under threat anymore - Robert Baratheon and Cassana Baratheon celebrated by feasting in The Ruby Ford.

story: Tyrion Lannister, the Lord of the House of Lannister, was known to be very good as an official for a long time. Everything was quiet when Petyr Baelish threatened the jewel of Tyrion Lannister a day later. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Shae, Tyrion Lannister learned the power of mind controlling. Tyrion Lannister met Euron Greyjoy at Christmas while on the way to the Trident and became immediately friends. At Christmas Tyrion Lannister finally faced Petyr Baelish in Saltpans, with the help of Euron Greyjoy and thanks to the learnt power of mind controlling, the alliance scared Petyr Baelish away. After the victory, the jewel was not threatened anymore. Tyrion Lannister and Euron Greyjoy celebrated in the Great Sept of Baelor with a story.

story: Margaery Tyrell was Queen Consort for the house Tyrell and was also known as an influencer in the entire kingdom. The evil Robert Baratheon one day posed a threat to the jewel of Margaery Tyrell. Our hero was too weak, but with the help of Mace Tyrell, Margaery learned Tyrell to control the powers of the mind. On the way to Moat Cailin at the Summer Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Joffrey Baratheon and they instantly became friends. Finally, at Christmas in Red Keep, Margaery Tyrell faced Robert Baratheon, with the help of Joffrey Baratheon and thanks to the learned powers of mind control, the alliance Robert Baratheon swayed away. This is how Margaery Tyrell managed to save the gem and celebrated by feasting at the Vale of Arryn with Joffrey Baratheon.

story: Margaery Tyrell was the queen. She was also known as an influencer in the whole kingdom. The evil Arya Stark posed a threat to the Jewel of Margaery Tyrell one day. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Loras Tyrell to seek help, Loras Tyrell was a master of mind controlling and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Seagard on the first day of the spring, Margaery met Tyrell Willas and they immediately became friends. After traveling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell finally found Arya Stark in The Ruby Ford with the help of Willas, and a bloody fight began but Margaery Tyrell thanks to mind controlling powers got the better of Arya Stark. The jewel was not under threat after the victory: Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell celebrated in Moat Cailin by listening to a telling.

story: Once upon a time, there was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell; Margaery Tyrell was a Queen of House Tyrell. The evil Cersei Lannister one day posed a threat to the castle of Margaery Tyrell. When the hero did not know what to do, he went to Loras Tyrell to seek help. Loras Tyrell was a master of fire sorcery and taught her all her secrets to the hero. During a long training session at Raventree Hall at Christmas, Margaery met Tyrell and immediately got along and decided to travel together. At Christmas, Margaery Tyrell and Alerie Tyrell were almost in Oldstones when they realized that Cersei Lannister was after them, but the two friends were ready and the battle began : Margaery Tyrell used Fire Sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the castle was no longer under threat. Margaery Tyrell and Alerie Tyrell celebrated by a play in White Harbor.

story: Once upon a time, a patron was an influencer whose name was Margaery Tyrell, and Margaery Tyrell was a Queen of the House of Tyrell. Everything was quiet when Robert Baratheon threatened the castle of Margaery Tyrell one day. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Joffrey Baratheon to seek help. Joffrey Baratheon was a master of firescy and taught the hero all of his secrets. At a long training session in the Vale of Arryn at the Winter Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Alerie Tyrell and immediately walked together to travel together. After traveling the entire kingdom of Margaery Tyrell found Robert Baratheon with the help of Alerie Tyrell in The Whispering Wood. A bloody battle began but Margaery Tyrell got the better of Robert Baratheon thanks to his fire spurs powers. After the victory, the castle was no longer under threat : Margaery Tyrell and Alerie Tyrell celebrated together in Great Sept of Baelor.
